alert.note: Alert for Lee; Pontotoc; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:49PM CDT until June 16 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 449 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Harmony, or 8 miles southeast of New Albany, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Verona, Trace State Park, Saltillo, Ecru, New Harmony, Troy, Furrs, Sherman, Algoma, Blue Springs, Hortontown, Endville, Cherry Creek, Branyan, Chiwapa, Ellistown, Jug Fork and Flowerdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
